businessProfile.name: Classico Pizzeria
businessProfile.address: 5 Udall Rd, West Islip, NY 11795, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 5 Udall Rd, West Islip, NY 11795, USA

reviews.text:
I went here based off of google reviews. I think I‚Äôve finally decided Suffolk county has the worst taste buds, especially when it comes to pizza.

I got a regular slice and a Sicilian with Pepperoni. I didn‚Äôt realize this had hot honey on it. Overly greasy, the sauce has no flavor, and it completely has kept me in the bathroom for the last hour.

The regular had so much grease dripping off of it. A sloppy mess when you try to eat it.

The hot honey Sicilian w/ pepperoni is just a bad idea. The cheese wasn‚Äôt fully cooked on it, tiny pepperonis with again grease puddles sitting in each one.

I was bummed out I had to finish that food.

Clean, inviting pizzeria with delicious slices. The tri-color grandma and chicken Francese with hot cherry peppers are showstoppers. The crust is soft but crispy. The pizza flavors are delicious. Staff are attentive and friendly also. Slice prices range ~$4-$5.25. it shares a lot with a laundromat, supermarket, and some other shops but there are some parking spaces available in front

Do yourself a favor and order the Classico Hero: chicken Francese, mozzarella and hot cherry peppers. This in pizza form is great, and somehow the hero is even better

Previously ordered food, ninety dollars. Got home was missing Greek salad. Called, I wasn‚Äôt returning as we had company. They said they would write that they owe me a Greek salad with my phone number. Tonite ordered heros, then told to check phone number as I was owed a Greek salad. Gentleman says ok I believe you. Go to pick up order and I‚Äôm charged for Greek salad. I tell them about being owed salad from previous order, and that I also mentioned it when placing order. Man says I didn‚Äôt check. I pay and leave. Get home the Greek salad was shredded lettuce, cherry tomato‚Äôs, a few cucumber slices, onions , and some black and Greek olives. Not a shred of feta cheese or Greek leaves as advertised. The dressing wasn‚Äôt enough to cover a crouton if you had one. Very disappointing, gave three attempts for them to fix their mistakes. But this was the final one.

Local, local local... One less star for credit card fees added to your bill, why? Nice local place, friendly service, lots of choices makes this a great little pizza/restaurant to go to!
Oh yeah, the tricolor pesto is great, as is the cherry pepper chicken francese slice are both great choices not to be found anywhere else!
My grandsons favorite place. Lives the bacon pizza the best ? ( This week Lol). However I too truly like the place. Great good great people. Worth a try for sure. Enjoy.

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

Young women very welcoming and helpful on the phone and in person and used coupon with no problem.   Food was delicious as always! Thank you
The people, service and food is the best!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza period!!!

detailedReviews.author: Catherine Murray
detailedReviews.text: Previously ordered food, ninety dollars. Got home was missing Greek salad. Called, I wasn‚Äôt returning as we had company. They said they would write that they owe me a Greek salad with my phone number. Tonite ordered heros, then told to check phone number as I was owed a Greek salad. Gentleman says ok I believe you. Go to pick up order and I‚Äôm charged for Greek salad. I tell them about being owed salad from previous order, and that I also mentioned it when placing order. Man says I didn‚Äôt check. I pay and leave. Get home the Greek salad was shredded lettuce, cherry tomato‚Äôs, a few cucumber slices, onions , and some black and Greek olives. Not a shred of feta cheese or Greek leaves as advertised. The dressing wasn‚Äôt enough to cover a crouton if you had one. Very disappointing, gave three attempts for them to fix their mistakes. But this was the final one.

detailedReviews.author: Dana Parrucci- Zambrano
detailedReviews.text: Young women very welcoming and helpful on the phone and in person and used coupon with no problem.   Food was delicious as always! Thank you

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Schaeffer
detailedReviews.text: The people, service and food is the best!

detailedReviews.author: Keith Greenwald
detailedReviews.text: Everything always perfect!

detailedReviews.author: thomas mcguiness
detailedReviews.text: Excellent grandma pie!

detailedReviews.author: anthony7124
detailedReviews.text: My grandsons favorite place. Lives the bacon pizza the best ? ( This week Lol). However I too truly like the place. Great good great people. Worth a try for sure. Enjoy.

detailedReviews.author: Thomas M
detailedReviews.text: My wife and I love Classico, great regular and  speciality slices,  everyone who works there are extremely friendly, they are the reasons we do pizza Fridays.

detailedReviews.author: Gisselle Moreno
detailedReviews.text: The best! Amazing pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: Wen Mendez
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza

detailedReviews.author: True Restorations Inc.
detailedReviews.text: We picked up a Classico pie and Tricolor Grandma with grilled chicken for our office luncheon today. Everyone thoroughly enjoyed both pies. We are so excited to have a new local pizzeria to order from for our future company lunches!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew E
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza! Will be coming back again. This place is awesome, thanks!

detailedReviews.author: David Villano Jr.
detailedReviews.text:
So my girlfriend and I recently moved in the area. Now though there‚Äôs a pizzeria closer to my apartment but this pizzeria is worth the drive.

This pizzeria has much more variety and the owners and pizza makers are very friendly and they work very hard. Even though they didn‚Äôt have any Caesar salad slices and they still made us Caesar slices and it came out very well. The pasta slices are out of this world. Very well done. Top tier customer service and pizza slices. This place is definitely underrated! Thank you for such a good Sunday dinner!! Will definitely return soon!

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa Bov√©-Hitrick
detailedReviews.text: One of the best places in a town where there are a lot of pizza options. Garlic knots were maybe the best I‚Äôve ever had and the tri color slice was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Antonio Cognato
detailedReviews.text:
FIRST TIME THIS FRIDAY, BROUGHT HOME A FULL SICILIAN PIE, WITH GARLIC!! FANTASTIC!!
IT WAS LIKE A CAKE! CHEESY.  FLAVORFUL,  CRUNCHY EDGES.
GOOD STUFF

detailedReviews.author: Ali G
detailedReviews.text: Great new Pizza spot in West Islip that I've been going to more & more compared to other Pizza spots in the area. I've only ordered the regular Cheese Pizza Pies there & it's the closest thing to something you would get at some of the well-known Pizza places in Manhattan or Brooklyn. üçïüôÇ

detailedReviews.author: Mark McKeon
detailedReviews.text: I've only order twice from here so far but, I will say the food that I ordered was great! I can't say much for atmosphere or service because it was quick takeout transactions, not much to base an opinion from. I will say the place appeared to be clean and inviting. On Valentine's Day I ordered a heart shaped cheese pie for the kids and they loved it. Pizza had great flavor, quality cheese as well. Garlic knots were perfect with a ton of flavor. We ordered a couple of vodka slices and I will say certainly the best vodka slice I've had yet ! They have a bunch of other pies that look not only interesting but delicious. Check out the website and social media pages to see the line up, they even have personal pies! This review was not paid for, I don't know them, I'm not affiliated in any way. Just go try the pizza it speaks for itself!

detailedReviews.author: Jairo Martinez
detailedReviews.text:
I went here based off of google reviews. I think I‚Äôve finally decided Suffolk county has the worst taste buds, especially when it comes to pizza.

I got a regular slice and a Sicilian with Pepperoni. I didn‚Äôt realize this had hot honey on it. Overly greasy, the sauce has no flavor, and it completely has kept me in the bathroom for the last hour.

The regular had so much grease dripping off of it. A sloppy mess when you try to eat it.

The hot honey Sicilian w/ pepperoni is just a bad idea. The cheese wasn‚Äôt fully cooked on it, tiny pepperonis with again grease puddles sitting in each one.

I was bummed out I had to finish that food.

detailedReviews.author: Greg Ulrich
detailedReviews.text: Called the order in and they told us they never received our call even though the number was in the phone and it was pretty apparent the woman behind the counter knew she messed up. That would have been fine if they apologized or had any sort of accountability but that seemed to not be a priority. Luckily we have 12 other options in town lol. Can‚Äôt tell you if the food is any good if they don‚Äôt give you any.

detailedReviews.author: LongIsland Foodtastic
detailedReviews.text:
This is our favorite pizzeria, the food is great!  I swear, we are here on a bi-weekly basis!

Our first visit was for the Eggplant Ala Vodka rolls (ask for extra Vodka sauce for dipping on the side), since then, we got HOOKED!  We also tried their individual pizzas (absolutely amazing, go for the ala vodka and eggplant rolatini).  They have so many great pizza options honestly.   For dessert, we tried their bombolinis, Nutella pizza, and sugar knots, all are so addictive!

Staff is friendly and always do a great job, very fast/efficient.

They have a few tables inside, so there is an option for dining in if you please.

detailedReviews.author: Evelyn Nowak
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza. Cauliflower pizza is really good!

detailedReviews.author: James O'Regan (Iggy)
detailedReviews.text: Check them out. Good stuff!!

detailedReviews.author: Ashley
detailedReviews.text: Been living in west islip for over 10 years have tried all the pizza spots around, new and old. By far our favorite! Especially for my picky family. They go all out and do any pies, calzones, dinners etc that I ask for! Thank you.

detailedReviews.author: A Herbo
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was not bad nor good it was okay at best

detailedReviews.author: Courtney Sacks
detailedReviews.text: amazing staff and food! The nutella donuts are a must try! will be ordering again!

detailedReviews.author: Noelle Perugini
detailedReviews.text: Food and service are amazing! BEST Penne Alla Vodka I‚Äôve ever had! Make sure you order the tri color grandma pie- delicious! ‚ú®

detailedReviews.author: Stella Ferrandino
detailedReviews.text: Thank you Classico Pizzeria! First time customer today but definitely not last. Everything we ordered was delicious! You also went above and beyond to replace an incorrect item sent and we are so grateful for kindness and amazing customer service. We will definitely be back! Grazie Mille!

detailedReviews.author: Hannah Conti
detailedReviews.text: The pizza and garlic knots are so incredibly oily. Delivery costs $2 plus tip. Terrible. I do not recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Joanne Onorato
detailedReviews.text: The food was delicious, I ordered the chicken classico, the chicken was so tender,I enjoyed it and Vinny was so nice and pleasant, thank you

detailedReviews.author: Talia B.
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food. I get my kid pizza from here once a week. Always delicious üòã

detailedReviews.author: Becky Bensin
detailedReviews.text:
Ordered a few trays for a work event and WOW! Everyone is raving about the food! The chicken parm was so delicious, the garlic knots were perfectly soft and buttery, and the penne ala vodka stole the show!
Whoever I spoke to on the phone when i ordered was so kind, informative, and helpful.
Will definitely be ordering from here again!

detailedReviews.author: Danielle DiNapoli
detailedReviews.text:
Clean, inviting pizzeria with delicious slices. The tri-color grandma and chicken Francese with hot cherry peppers are showstoppers. The crust is soft but crispy. The pizza flavors are delicious. Staff are attentive and friendly also. Slice prices range ~$4-$5.25. it shares a lot with a laundromat, supermarket, and some other shops but there are some parking spaces available in front

Do yourself a favor and order the Classico Hero: chicken Francese, mozzarella and hot cherry peppers. This in pizza form is great, and somehow the hero is even better

detailedReviews.author: Thera Farms
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food and friendly staff! 5 stars all the way!

detailedReviews.author: David S
detailedReviews.text:
Local, local local... One less star for credit card fees added to your bill, why? Nice local place, friendly service, lots of choices makes this a great little pizza/restaurant to go to!
Oh yeah, the tricolor pesto is great, as is the cherry pepper chicken francese slice are both great choices not to be found anywhere else!

detailedReviews.author: Patrick O'Regan
detailedReviews.text: Great food amazing staff great service!!!

detailedReviews.author: Callie Cuff
detailedReviews.text: Wow this place is delicious!!! We got the grandma pizza, the hot honey pepperoni, and vodka sauce. Everything was scrumptious! Highly highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Edward Spradley
detailedReviews.text: Best vodka slice I‚Äôve had in a while

detailedReviews.author: Walter Koprowski
detailedReviews.text: Had the paninis, wings and margarita pie.  All excellent!!!

detailedReviews.author: Denise Monks
detailedReviews.text: I also just tried the Grandma Pie and loved it‚Ä¶the best I‚Äôve had‚Ä¶our new pizzeria.

detailedReviews.author: Justin A
detailedReviews.text: best pizza around here in a while

detailedReviews.author: John Adorno
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and friendly service

detailedReviews.author: C S
detailedReviews.text: delicious pizza and the friendliest staff!

detailedReviews.author: Erica Bider
detailedReviews.text: New Favorite West Islip Pizza place. The hot honey pepperoni, and the tri colored pie are crazy good!

detailedReviews.author: LOWLOWS18
detailedReviews.text: The best

detailedReviews.author: user 321
detailedReviews.text: kitchen food and pizza is amazing. Definitely recommend, staff is super nice

detailedReviews.author: N Z
detailedReviews.text: Been looking for some reallllly good pizza spot and found this!! So good

detailedReviews.author: Jay Giberson
detailedReviews.text: Class acts at this place. Great food. After being a revolving door for several years, I have a feeling Classico is here to stay. They took the time to make the space their own and really nailed it. Try them out, you won't be disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Salvatore Spatafora
detailedReviews.text: Came because of the ratings, going back because the ratings were all accurate. Let‚Äôs try to keep this as the only pizza place on Long Island with a perfect 5 rating. Well deserved üò©üçïüôåüèªüî•

detailedReviews.author: Kris Bittner
detailedReviews.text: Very decent pizza

detailedReviews.author: Shannon McNally
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza! Grandma slice is 10/10.

detailedReviews.author: Ray Z
detailedReviews.text: Excellent, new to the neighborhood. Good luck in your venture!!

detailedReviews.author: Keith Weinberg
detailedReviews.text: Slices were huge and all the food was great.

detailedReviews.author: Richie Stack
detailedReviews.text: Excellent Pizza and really nice staff. The Tri-color grandma pie might be my new favorite slice of pizza anywhere.  Will definitely be returning!

detailedReviews.author: RJ P. (BIGWORM)
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizzeria! My new favorite spot in West Islip!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 75 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the friendly and welcoming staff, which enhances their dining experience and encourages repeat visits. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The variety and quality of pizza, including specialty slices like the Tricolor Grandma and Caesar salad slices, are highly praised by customers. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The pizzeria's ability to create custom orders, such as heart-shaped pies for special occasions, delights customers and sets them apart from competitors. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to order mistakes and poor food quality - review management can address this concern
Poor online visibility and competition with other local options - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness, particularly regarding unique menu items - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
